00052 MSVehicleControl::MSVehicleControl() :
00053     myLoadedVehNo(0),
00054     myRunningVehNo(0),
00055     myEndedVehNo(0),
00056     myTotalDepartureDelay(0),
00057     myTotalTravelTime(0),
00058     myDefaultVTypeMayBeDeleted(true),
00059     myWaitingForPerson(0) {
00060     SUMOVTypeParameter defType;
00061     myVTypeDict[DEFAULT_VTYPE_ID] = MSVehicleType::build(defType);
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 MSVehicleControl::~MSVehicleControl() {
00066     // delete vehicles
00067     for (VehicleDictType::iterator i = myVehicleDict.begin(); i != myVehicleDict.end(); ++i) {
00068         delete(*i).second;
00069     }
00070     myVehicleDict.clear();
00071     // delete vehicle type distributions
00072     for (VTypeDistDictType::iterator i = myVTypeDistDict.begin(); i != myVTypeDistDict.end(); ++i) {
00073         delete(*i).second;
00074     }
00075     myVTypeDistDict.clear();
00076     // delete vehicle types
00077     for (VTypeDictType::iterator i = myVTypeDict.begin(); i != myVTypeDict.end(); ++i) {
00078         delete(*i).second;
00079     }
00080     myVTypeDict.clear();
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 SUMOVehicle*
00085 MSVehicleControl::buildVehicle(SUMOVehicleParameter* defs,
00086                                const MSRoute* route,
00087                                const MSVehicleType* type) {
00088     myLoadedVehNo++;
00089     MSVehicle* built = new MSVehicle(defs, route, type, myLoadedVehNo - 1);
00090     MSNet::getInstance()->informVehicleStateListener(built, MSNet::VEHICLE_STATE_BUILT);
00091     return built;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 void
00096 MSVehicleControl::scheduleVehicleRemoval(SUMOVehicle* veh) {
00097     assert(myRunningVehNo > 0);
00098     for (std::vector<MSDevice*>::const_iterator i = veh->getDevices().begin(); i != veh->getDevices().end(); ++i) {
00099         (*i)->generateOutput();
00100     }
00101     if (OptionsCont::getOptions().isSet("tripinfo-output")) {
00102         OutputDevice::getDeviceByOption("tripinfo-output").closeTag(veh->getDevices().size() == 1);
00103     }
00104     myTotalTravelTime += STEPS2TIME(MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep() - veh->getDeparture());
00105     myRunningVehNo--;
00106     MSNet::getInstance()->informVehicleStateListener(veh, MSNet::VEHICLE_STATE_ARRIVED);
00107     deleteVehicle(veh);
00108 }

00110 
00111 void
00112 MSVehicleControl::printMeanWaitingTime(OutputDevice& od) const {
00113     if (getDepartedVehicleNo() == 0) {
00114         od << -1.;
00115     } else {
00116         od << (myTotalDepartureDelay / (SUMOReal) getDepartedVehicleNo());
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 void
00122 MSVehicleControl::printMeanTravelTime(OutputDevice& od) const {
00123     if (myEndedVehNo == 0) {
00124         od << -1.;
00125     } else {
00126         od << (myTotalTravelTime / (SUMOReal) myEndedVehNo);
00127     }
00128 }
00129 
00130 
00131 void
00132 MSVehicleControl::vehicleDeparted(const SUMOVehicle& v) {
00133     ++myRunningVehNo;
00134     myTotalDepartureDelay += STEPS2TIME(v.getDeparture() - STEPFLOOR(v.getParameter().depart));
00135     MSNet::getInstance()->informVehicleStateListener(&v, MSNet::VEHICLE_STATE_DEPARTED);
00136 }

00148 
00149 bool
00150 MSVehicleControl::addVehicle(const std::string& id, SUMOVehicle* v) {
00151     VehicleDictType::iterator it = myVehicleDict.find(id);
00152     if (it == myVehicleDict.end()) {
00153         // id not in myVehicleDict.
00154         myVehicleDict[id] = v;
00155         return true;
00156     }
00157     return false;
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 SUMOVehicle*
00162 MSVehicleControl::getVehicle(const std::string& id) const {
00163     VehicleDictType::const_iterator it = myVehicleDict.find(id);
00164     if (it == myVehicleDict.end()) {
00165         return 0;
00166     }
00167     return it->second;
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 void
00172 MSVehicleControl::deleteVehicle(SUMOVehicle* veh) {
00173     myEndedVehNo++;
00174     myVehicleDict.erase(veh->getID());
00175     delete veh;
00176 }

00178 
00179 MSVehicleControl::constVehIt
00180 MSVehicleControl::loadedVehBegin() const {
00181     return myVehicleDict.begin();
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 MSVehicleControl::constVehIt
00186 MSVehicleControl::loadedVehEnd() const {
00187     return myVehicleDict.end();
00188 }

00190 
00191 bool
00192 MSVehicleControl::checkVType(const std::string& id) {
00193     if (id == DEFAULT_VTYPE_ID) {
00194         if (myDefaultVTypeMayBeDeleted) {
00195             delete myVTypeDict[id];
00196             myVTypeDict.erase(myVTypeDict.find(id));
00197             myDefaultVTypeMayBeDeleted = false;
00198         } else {
00199             return false;
00200         }
00201     } else {
00202         if (myVTypeDict.find(id) != myVTypeDict.end() || myVTypeDistDict.find(id) != myVTypeDistDict.end()) {
00203             return false;
00204         }
00205     }
00206     return true;
00207 }
00208 
00209 bool
00210 MSVehicleControl::addVType(MSVehicleType* vehType) {
00211     if (checkVType(vehType->getID())) {
00212         myVTypeDict[vehType->getID()] = vehType;
00213         return true;
00214     }
00215     return false;
00216 }
00217 
00218 
00219 bool
00220 MSVehicleControl::addVTypeDistribution(const std::string& id, RandomDistributor<MSVehicleType*> *vehTypeDistribution) {
00221     if (checkVType(id)) {
00222         myVTypeDistDict[id] = vehTypeDistribution;
00223         return true;
00224     }
00225     return false;
00226 }
00227 
00228 
00229 bool
00230 MSVehicleControl::hasVTypeDistribution(const std::string& id) const {
00231     return myVTypeDistDict.find(id) != myVTypeDistDict.end();
00232 }
00233 
00234 
00235 MSVehicleType*
00236 MSVehicleControl::getVType(const std::string& id) {
00237     VTypeDictType::iterator it = myVTypeDict.find(id);
00238     if (it == myVTypeDict.end()) {
00239         VTypeDistDictType::iterator it2 = myVTypeDistDict.find(id);
00240         if (it2 == myVTypeDistDict.end()) {
00241             return 0;
00242         }
00243         return it2->second->get();
00244     }
00245     if (id == DEFAULT_VTYPE_ID) {
00246         myDefaultVTypeMayBeDeleted = false;
00247     }
00248     return it->second;
00249 }
00250 
00251 
00252 void
00253 MSVehicleControl::insertVTypeIDs(std::vector<std::string> &into) const {
00254     into.reserve(into.size() + myVTypeDict.size() + myVTypeDistDict.size());
00255     for (VTypeDictType::const_iterator i = myVTypeDict.begin(); i != myVTypeDict.end(); ++i) {
00256         into.push_back((*i).first);
00257     }
00258     for (VTypeDistDictType::const_iterator i = myVTypeDistDict.begin(); i != myVTypeDistDict.end(); ++i) {
00259         into.push_back((*i).first);
00260     }
00261 }
00262 
00263 
00264 void
00265 MSVehicleControl::addWaiting(const MSEdge* const edge, SUMOVehicle* vehicle) {
00266     if (myWaiting.find(edge) == myWaiting.end()) {
00267         myWaiting[edge] = std::vector<SUMOVehicle*>();
00268     }
00269     myWaiting[edge].push_back(vehicle);
00270 }
00271 
00272 
00273 void
00274 MSVehicleControl::removeWaiting(const MSEdge* const edge, SUMOVehicle* vehicle) {
00275     if (myWaiting.find(edge) != myWaiting.end()) {
00276         std::vector<SUMOVehicle*>::iterator it = std::find(myWaiting[edge].begin(), myWaiting[edge].end(), vehicle);
00277         if (it != myWaiting[edge].end()) {
00278             myWaiting[edge].erase(it);
00279         }
00280     }
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00284 SUMOVehicle*
00285 MSVehicleControl::getWaitingVehicle(const MSEdge* const edge, const std::set<std::string> &lines) {
00286     if (myWaiting.find(edge) != myWaiting.end()) {
00287         for (std::vector<SUMOVehicle*>::const_iterator it = myWaiting[edge].begin(); it != myWaiting[edge].end(); ++it) {
00288             const std::string& line = (*it)->getParameter().line == "" ? (*it)->getParameter().id : (*it)->getParameter().line;
00289             if (lines.count(line)) {
00290                 return (*it);
00291             }
00292         }
00293     }
00294     return 0;
00295 }
00296 
00297 
00298 void
00299 MSVehicleControl::abortWaiting() {
00300     for (VehicleDictType::iterator i = myVehicleDict.begin(); i != myVehicleDict.end(); ++i) {
00301         WRITE_WARNING("Vehicle " + i->first + " aborted waiting for a person that will never come.");
00302     }
00303 }
